message.body: Hey gals. the vet is rescheduled for shots to april 9 at 11am
Ok! I set up an account, and I can't be there that day so I'll leave a copy of his records & a note with the shots he'll need (strangles booster & Potomac). Thanks!
ot need anything. i think they stopped doing potomac around here
U dont have to do strangles once ur here. i only require it for incoming horses. it has alot of side effects and is only 50% effective. ur horse might n
Ok, that would be nice! I can leave copies of his stuff anyway so they have it on file. Thanks!
